Having a go at some initial text stuff, based on the [tidy text book](http://tidytextmining.com/tidytext.html). 


```{r}
# load in the data
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
load(file = "../data/all_documents.Rda")
```

Let's test out some things on just one article

```{r}
test <- all_documents[[1]]$text

text_df <- data_frame(paragraph = 1:length(test), text = test)
head(text_df)
```

We need to both break the text into individual tokens


```{r}
tidy_text <- text_df %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, text)
data("stop_words")
tidy_text <- tidy_text %>% anti_join(stop_words)
tidy_text %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE) 
```
